title.narrative: Marginalized women and young women have access to, participate in and achieve quality learning, entrepreneurship and employment outcomes through second chance education

description.narrative: The Second Chance Education and Vocational Learning (SCE) Program aims to break current trends and provide a comprehensive solution for marginalized women and young women who have missed out on education and who are at risk of being left behind

title.narrative: SN_Narrative
SN_DRF
Graduate mentoring and coaching programme established. Women and young women become mentors to new learners to share experiences, advice, and support for second chance education.
